strings.Value: "Good day! I came to tell you that I'm doing fine in my little shop. Our folk love their ruler, and if their beloved {mf|baron|baroness|King|Queen} buys old Bokken's potions, he's certainly a worthy alchemist!"

"Ha, greetings, {mf|baron|baroness|my King|my Queen}! I'm drowning in orders these days, and barely have time to do them all. My regular clients have mostly been peasants and hunters, but arcanists are showing up from time to time. Not only do they pay me for potions, but they also help me create some of them."
"Here's the gift for you on this occasion."
